sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "../css/Projects.css" import {VscTriangleDown } from "react-icons/vsc" import { SiGithub } from 'react-icons/si' import { FaRocket } from 'react-icons/fa' import TnAcademy from "../Images/TnAcademy_Landingpage_Screenshot.png" export default function Projects() { return

PROJECTS

{/* Project 1 */}
{/* */}

TrickNastics: Landing Page

The TrickNastics Landing Page is suitable for web and mobile, this is a full stack app formed of a React.js frontend and using the mailchimp API for backend.Hosted on a Heroku server.


In order to gain experience working across the full stack. I wanted to use an API that could collect the data being inputted, and use this to benefit the client by allowing them access to mailchimp. Which provides further services to advance reach to their viewers.


See my approach


See it live

{/* Project 2 */}
}
